author: addaleax
message:
src: remove long-deprecated APIs without `Isolate*` arg

These have been deprecated since 75adde07f9a2de7f38a67bec72bd37
(February 2014) and most likely do not see much ecosystem usage
to begin with.

PR-URL: https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/23178
